approveServiceAcceptance(uint256).notice: STEP 2: Requester approves the acceptance (mints NFT) Only the service requester can call this

rejectServiceAcceptance(uint256).notice: STEP 2 (Alternative): Requester rejects the acceptance Only the service requester can call this

requestServiceAcceptance(uint256).notice: STEP 1: Request to accept service (no approval yet) This creates a pending request that the requester must approve

userdoc.notice: A smart contract that manages service requests with NFT escrow Implements two-signature approval system
